message.body: Hey rudys got sick last night and was acting weird.. Just a heads up.. See if u can diagnose whats wrong
Oh wow Rudy looks really ill. I would take him to the vet. He was fine yesterday when I let him in the back yard, and I've never seen him look like this.
I've also never seen him by the front door.
He is always on his cushion when I enter.
I can take him to a vet if ou have one
*you
Damn na u dont have to i will take him when im off work

Ok. To be fair, he always looks a bit like he is one gasp away from keeling over...(He isn't the most robust dog.) This is bad even for him though. He is making little gurgle noises and is laying in front of front door and not moving.
Thnx appreciate it
Here are my pics of Rudy from the week :)
￼My whole phone is full of pics of him
Haha u love him
￼I do
Its my moms dog and i think we are actually going to look for a new home for him.. If ur interested
￼Alec and I are engaged now actually and sometimes he meets Rudy and duke and i for our walk hahaha
I can't :( I'm not allowed to have dogs at my place, but I'll ask Alec.
￼Sending him
Haha ok cool
Haha thats cool did u guys meet thru the dogwalking
I set a vet appnt w rudy for 3 ill leave work early
Yes we met while I introduced him to duke! It was the first time we talked haha
We fell in puppylove cuuuuute
Haha duke does that
Hey girls, rudy passed away today from either a heart or stomach complication.. He was 11 yrs old. i appreciate you guys going out of the way to include him on the walks.. He lived a long good life
Thnx..Gonna miss seeing the snaggle tooth
